title: I wore skinny jeans and maddd people started staring at me
body:
Not offending LGBT community, don't want to be on their hit list.

Why are people staring at me because I am wearing super skinny jeans?
Skinny jeans is for skinny people. It's in the name.
Everyone says skinny jeans are fashionable if you are a skinny person.
Obviously if someone has moose thighs they won't look good in skinny jeans.

You can't call me gay because gay people wears skinny jeans and nobody stares at them.
I talk to gay guys and I asked these 2 questions: 
Why do people stare at me?
Do people stare at you?

Most of the answers is I don't know and no in that order.

My question is why do people stare at me when I wear super skinny jeans to the point where you can see my physique.
